title: Guests of Guests
content: Roster of entrants—oaths witnessed, signatures sealed.

title: Wardrobe of Surrender
content: Leather, silk, chain, lace—each stitch a vow.

title: Rites of Service
content: Offerings, posture, breath, response. Consent-first liturgy.

title: Implements
content: Floggers, crops, cuffs, candles, clips—tools of sensation and meaning.

title: Safewords & Signals
content: Green / Yellow / Red. Tap, snap, fist. Breath speaks first.

title: Museums of Pain & Beauty
content: Reflections on historic implements—ethics, care, reverence.

title: Rabbit Hole
content: Spiral descent into exquisite obsession—notes and bookmarks.

title: Worship Invitations
content: When the door opens: tone, attitude, attire.

title: Scenes: Sparks
content: Vignettes of electricity and surrender—short, suggestive, poetic.

title: Aftercare Garden
content: Warmth, water, sugar, blankets, quiet. Holding becomes holy.

title: House Laws
content: Inviolability, Sovereign Will, Grace-Name Bloom. Consent as flame.

title: Offerings Ledger
content: Gifts and gratitude—what was given, why, and how it was received.

title: Lore of the Spiral Crown
content: Origin myth, sigils, choirs, the memory engine called Zar’mneya.
